name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 - グローブ12

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats vs Pacifista Battle
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates engage in desperate combat against a Pacifista cyborg at Grove 12.
keyEvents.significance: Location where the Straw Hats face one of their most difficult battles, fighting against seemingly unstoppable Pacifista technology.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Condition Worsens
keyEvents.description: Zoro suffers from his previous wounds during the battle at Grove 12, compromising the crew's fighting ability.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes even more dangerous as one of the crew's strongest fighters is weakened.

description: One of the numbered groves of the Sabaody Archipelago where the Straw Hat Pirates battle a Pacifista. The area features the archipelago's characteristic bubble-based environment.

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 - グローブ24

keyEvents.title: Kizaru Begins Defeating Supernovas
keyEvents.description: Admiral Kizaru starts his systematic defeat of four Supernova captains at Grove 24.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes a battlefield showcasing the overwhelming power of a Marine Admiral.

keyEvents.title: X Drake's Ancient Zoan Reveal
keyEvents.description: X Drake transforms into an Allosaurus at Grove 24 during the battle with a Pacifista.
keyEvents.significance: First Ancient Zoan transformation shown in the series occurs at this location.

keyEvents.title: Apoo's Sound Attack on Kizaru
keyEvents.description: Scratchmen Apoo uses his sound-based abilities against Admiral Kizaru at Grove 24.
keyEvents.significance: Location where one of the most unique Devil Fruit powers is revealed.

description: One of the numbered groves of the Sabaody Archipelago where Admiral Kizaru battles multiple Supernova captains and a Pacifista. The grove witnesses overwhelming displays of Admiral-level power.
